name: The 4th Int'l Conference on Medical Imaging
content: The 4th Int'l Conference on Medical Imaging (CMI 2024) will be held during July 19-21, 2024 in Xi'an, China. This prestigious conference aims to assemble experts and scholars from around the globe to discuss and explore various essential topics, including Medical Imaging and Analysis, Computer-Aided Diagnosis, Imaging Informatics for Healthcare, Research, and Applicationsetc, Machine Vision in Medicine, Ultrasonic Imaging, 3D Imaging, Magnetic resonance imaging, and much more.
